## 1. SETTING UP
### `git config`
- [ ] Set up your name and email

### Forking a repository
- [ ] Fork this repository to your Github account

### `git clone`
-  [ ] Clone the forked repo to your local machine

### `git remote`

## 2. WORKFLOW
### `git fetch`

### `git pull`

### `git add`

### `git commit`

### `git push`
